name: Senior Research Scientist
description:
Senior Research Scientist

Position Responsibility:

  • Work on the problems of future network architecture, protocols and algorithms:
    • analyze engineering problems in their essence,
    • describe them as mathematical problems,
    • analyze and search for solutions that meet given requirements,
    • implement prototypes and evaluate their performance;
  • Create mathematical models of networks for different requirements and under different constraints and analyze them. Model network behavior within close-to-real industrial scenarios, analyze the results and suggest improvements for network structure and properties;
  • Analyze network model behavior and provide theoretical reasoning to explain it. When possible, improve theoretical bounds for scenarios under consideration, suggest new research directions based on encountered problems:
    • combine multiple approaches to find the best solution – from Graph Theory and Network Calculus to AI- & ML-based techniques,
    • develop brand new techniques at the intersection of different sciences – mathematics, physics, computer science, etc. – to provide novel approaches to research, model and analyze networks of the future;

Position requirements:

  • Ph.D. degree (or in progress) in Applied Mathematics/Mathematics/Computer Science/Electrical engineering/Physics etc.;
  • Have good knowledge of one or more below:
    • Graph theory;
    • Optimization theory;
    • Algorithms and data structures;
    • Machine Learning;
    • Probability theory;
    • Stochastic analysis;
    • Scheduling, queuing theory;
    • Network calculus;
  • Be able to initiate and develop new ideas in collaboration with both external and internal partners;
  • A good command of English and Russian.

Will be advantage:

  • Having successful experience in a specific practical field (priority in the network field, other related fields can be used as a reference) with one or more above mentioned mathematical theories or methods;
  • Being good at combining mathematical theories and engineering practice, analyzing problems to the root causes and solving practical problems using mathematical theories and methods;
  • Knowledge the basic theory and development trends of IT industry, such as network or computer architectures, Cloud/Edge computing, AI, 5G, IoT, robotics, etc.;
  • Having experience in network-related research, including but not limited to network architecture, network protocol, network algorithm, network modeling, AI, etc.
  • Having programming experience (C/C++, Python etc.), experience of working with data and Neural Networks.

Position benefits:

  • Ability to shape the future of our world with your own hands right now;
  • Extremely interesting and challenging tasks with practical application;
  • Ability to see the results of your research in real products immediately;
  • Great team and unlimited options for your professional development;
  • Clear career path with ability for quick growth;
  • Competitive salary and benefits;
  • Comfortable office in the center of Moscow – Smolenskaya Square
    • Nice rest area with board games and PlayStation;
    • Music corner with piano, guitars and drums;
    • Sports corner to keep you always in form;
  • Medical insurance.
